body_html:
I think the cuda auto configuration change had a bug that didn't properly propagate the cuda capabilities env variable, but we cherry-picked that into r0.10 in 761e6de

so hopefully the latest nightly build has that in and it should work.
body_text:
I think the cuda auto configuration change had a bug that didn't properly propagate the cuda capabilities env variable, but we cherry-picked that into r0.10 in 761e6de
so hopefully the latest nightly build has that in and it should work.
body:
I think the cuda auto configuration change had a bug that didn't properly propagate the cuda capabilities env variable, but we cherry-picked that into r0.10 in https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/commit/761e6de4357786bee049e63e227b03d57f18bab0

so hopefully the latest nightly build has that in and it should work.
